description: You see a great desert of fiery torment.
You see a great desert of fiery torment.
You see a great desert of fiery torment.
A towering stone portcullis heavily decorated in carvings of various
acts of torture involving stinging poison and acids blocks any further
passage to the west.  The center of the giant  doorway is covered in a
carving of a  once beautiful angel screaming in  agony as  her face is
melted away and her once legendary wings are reduced to  useless stubs
of bone.  So lifelike is the image that a faint scream of purest agony
can be  heard coming  from  the gaping mouth  of the angel.  To either
side  of the  portcullis are  thick iron  bars  giving a  view of  the
hideous figures bound for all eternity to serve their master.  To your
horror you realize the gigantic  brutes have no  hands.  Instead their
hands have  been removed  and their thick forearms have  been fixed to
the handle of the cranks which operate the portcullis.

being the machines first guinea pig.  Assuming  the devices kill their
victims within the prescribed ranges of pain, time of torture, and the
poor bastard does indeed come out of the torture no longer living, the
machine is then shipped down the hall to  the quality assurance  team.

A vast wasteland of sorrow spans the west.
{w
This shade is an odd character of sorts.  It

trivial things.  All around its shop are the
worthless things of mortal plights:  bottles,

description: You see bars
The streets of Dis stand in flames.
Obviously the abode  of some  purely evil and malevolent  being this
large chamber is filled with  echoing screams of pain.  Huge vats of a
bubbling green liquid  release  whisps of  noxious fumes that burn the
eyes and nose.  The green  glow of  the acid bathes the chamber with a
sickly aura.   Large, disfigured  brutes chain  helpless  victims to a
series  of wenches.  The thugs are so hideously  scarred by  the acid,
that it is next to impossible to ascertain who or what they once were.
Still more of  the  tormentors are  turning large cranks which  slowly
lower the  victims feet  first  into the vats.  A large dais is at the
center of it all its  raised elevation giving anyone who resides there
a perfect view of all the happenings at the vats.  Atop the dais rests
a horrifying throne  created from  countless skeletons  that have been
completely stripped of flesh and polished to a sickly shine.

This impressive chamber houses a  plethora of pain inducing devices.
Each device is  continuously running to make certain  that at the most

task.  A strange group of participants in the stress testing locked in

|  Bloodstoner Mansion    |

|  Bloodstoner Road,      |

You can only imagine what horror Nisstyre has personally requested of

Huge wooden  crates are all about the room.  Some  loaded onto carts

gives the impression  that this experience will not be as enjoyable as
some might hope for.
10463.room_name: A wickedly tempting {8d{Mro{8w {wnurse{x waits here to treat you.
10463.name: a {8d{Mro{8w {wnurse{x~

description:
A snake of  unbelievable size rises  from behind its masters throne to
investigate  the meal that has disturbed its lord.  Its body is coated
in scales of a shimmering olive color crossed with rings of black.  At
your approach the snakes tell-tale fan of flesh expands as it prepares
to strike.
10464.room_name: A King Cobra more than fifty feet in length rises threateningly.
10464.name: A king cobra of enormous size~

description:
A light buff color with  a series of dark  diamonds running  along the
back of the snakes body which ends in a huge rattle, that is quivering
threateningly at your  presence, this snake is an incredibly overgrown
Diamondback Rattlesnake.
10465.room_name: A Diamondback Rattlesnake over twenty feet long lies coiled in front of the throne.
10465.name: An Angry Rattlesnake~

description:
A huge reddish snake with dark brown crossbands and the characteristic
black  spine at  the tip of  its tail this snake is  obviously a Death
Adder.  None to pleased with your presence in its master's throne room
the snake  flattens its body as it  prepares to strike should anything
wander too close to its master.
10466.room_name: A Death Adder nearly ten feet in length lies coiled around the base of the throne.
10466.name: A hissing Death Adder~

description:
Yellowed hide  covers the thick muscled body of this enormous servant.
Emotionlessly going about the  task of removing the  multitude of dead
bodies from the various gas chambers this soulless slave shows no pity
for those it punishes.
10467.room_name: A {wlarge {yye{gll{yowish {8ogre{x drags armloads of dead bodies out of a gas chamber.
10467.name: {*A {yye{gll{yow {*tinged ogre{x~

description:
This large, black-scaled demon laughs merrily as he watches poor souls
scream out in pain. He pokes and picks at the flesh of the damned who
were unlucky enough to be tortured close to him.  His black-taloned
nails rip slowly through their flesh as he cackles with glee at the
sounds of their unending pain...
10468.room_name: The {wg{8reater {yf{Ri{Yr{re {cd{Re{cm{Ro{cn{x stands here, laughing maniacally at the tormented.
10468.name: the {wg{8reater {yf{Ri{Yr{re {cd{Re{cm{Ro{cn{x~

description: This filth is nasty and crawling with maggots. It makes you ill.
10469.room_name: A {mtr{wick{mle {xof {8f{yi{8l{yt{8h{x oozes down the walls of this pit.
10469.name: the {mtr{wick{mle {xof {8f{yi{8l{yt{8h{x~

description:
One of the  servants of Sachmed this  huge being has been  twisted  by
the poisonous gases which it is exposed to as it carries  out the will
of its  master.  The thick hide of its  body is now   the color of the
fumes  which expell  from its  nostrils each  time the brute  exhales.
10470.room_name: A {whuge {8o{rg{cr{ye{x the color of vomit drags a desperate sinner to his eternal damnation.
10470.name: a {whuge{x, {gug{yl{gy gr{Gee{gn {8o{rg{cr{ye{x~

description: Mmmmmmm.....Steak....Mmmmmm...You feel your mouth start to water.
10471.room_name: A prechewed juicy steak is here, waiting to be enjoyed.
10471.name: juicy steak~

description: This mob holds the mprog to fire random events as people enter the room.
10472.room_name: ({WWizi{x) The Random Encounter Mprog Holder is here.
10472.name: Random Encounter Prog Holder~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 10450 50~

10473.room_name: ({WWizi{x) Acid Pool Mprog Holder stands here.
10473.name: Acid Pool Mprog Holder~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M act 10451 drinks liquid acid from a pool~

description:
While not a particularly sinister looking little fellow this odd gnome
apparently has a liking for  torture devices.  He appears  to be quite
enjoying his job of designing and building his devices.  His attire is
quite odd; his pointy  little face is  nearly completely  covered by a
huge pair of glasses  which appear  to have been  heavily modified  to
suit  his needs, while the  rest of his clothing is so covered with an
array of pockets of every size it is hard to guess at his actual size.
10474.room_name: A {8strange {clittle {ygn{go{yme {xis here tinkering away at the machines.
10474.name: {YN{We{Ybl{Wi{Yx{x~

description:
This boatman is draped in dark red strips of cloth that sparsely
conceal the bony being beneath.  It stands in silence, one hand upon
the oar and another extended waiting for the fare.
10475.room_name: The {Wb{8oa{Wtm{8a{Wn{x of the {cR{ri{cv{re{cr St{ry{cx{x stands in his boat.
10475.name: {xthe {Wb{8oa{Wtm{8a{Wn{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M exall 10406 1~
M bribe 10405 100~

10476.name: the Oneway Mprog Mob~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M exall 10407 3~

description:
A mad glint in this surgeon's eye  gives the impression  that his help
might do  more harm than  good.  His long white  smock and  gloves are
quite liberally spattered with blood.  Smears  of blood cover his face
since he chooses not  to wear a mask while he performs his tasks.  The
bloody scalpel he  holds is not a particularly vicious weapon but each
precise cut of  that tiny blade  could bring about  unimaginable pain.
10477.room_name: A {Rm{wa{Rn{8ia{Rc{wa{Rl {cs{gu{wr{Bg{we{go{cn {xis eagerly waiting for his next opportunity to use his scalpel.
10477.name: {*Dr. {RDr{ra{cv{rn{Rok{x~

description:
Barely three feet tall and a  bright red in color this little devil is
one of the tormentors that makes  his home in the  lake of fire above.
Apparently it  has taken a  vacation to come watch the doctor's grisly
work.  The little  fiend seems to be  enjoying each tiny  slice of the
surgeons scalpel as  he operates on the unlucky soul left to his care.
10478.room_name: A {clittle {8imp {xeagerly watches the surgeon at work.
10478.name: {*A {Rf{Yi{rr{Re {*imp{x~

description:
Barely more than a mass of wrinkles and sagging skin this poor soul is
sitting in a wheelchair staring and drooling.  The balding creature is
hard to  place.  Male or female? Its really anyones  guess by now, the
hair is gone or nearly so and  everything seems to have blended into a
series of shapeless wrinkles.
10479.room_name: An {ce{wl{8der{wl{cy {yperson{x in a wheelchair sits staring at whatever it happens to be facing.
10479.name: an {ce{wl{8der{wl{cy {Bs{coul{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
This little devil runs rampant  through the hospital waiting room, all
the while the proud parents simply ignore it and explain their hellish
behavior  away as "Oh, kids will be kids".  This  discipline free brat
is pretty typical of  the snotty-nosed hellions that  terrorize nearly
all public places.  Something  about this little  fiend just makes you
want to draw your weapons and remove it from the world forever.
10480.room_name: A {yyoung {gchild {xruns around {wscreaming{x at the top of its lungs.
10480.name: a {wscreaming {gchild{x~

description:
A heavily armored  figure towering  well over eight feet in height, he
is obviously the  ruler of  this region of  the Cocytus.  The  unlucky
souls who end up in his corner of hell are  treated to the tortures of
flesh melting  acids as well as deadly  poisons.  His armor is a  vast
suit of black metal plates and spikes that shimmers with a green cast.
The whole of his appearence appears to be slightly liquid as if melted
and then let to  solidify and harden.  His bone  white face  is barely
visible through the face guard of his helm.
10481.room_name: A {mm{ra{ws{Ws{wi{rv{me {Bfigure {xsits upon a huge throne at the center of the room.
10481.name: {gS{Ga{gc{Wh{gm{Ge{gd{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M death 10446 75~

description:
A soul  tormented by the horror  that now exists  where its  beautiful
body  once was this  being sobs  uncontrollably.  The  incredibly high
levels of  radiation in this room have  disfigured ever aspect of this
unfortunate creatures appearence.  Extra appendages or facial features
seem to have  sprouted in places  they most definitely do  not belong.
10482.room_name: An {mi{rrr{Ma{ydi{Ra{rte{md {Bs{coul{x sobs in misery at the wretch it has become.
10482.name: an {mi{rrr{Ma{ydi{Ra{rte{md {Bs{coul{x~

description:
A horrifying creation of  mismatched body  parts that  have apparently
been reattached at random.  This poor creature is used in the constant
testing of  the torture  devices and  appears to be  reassembled after
each of its ordeals to endure yet another torturous experience.
10483.room_name: A {Bs{coul {xcreated of {wm{ci{ys{mm{ga{rt{8c{yh{me{wd{x body parts waits here to be dismembered yet again.
10483.name: a {wm{ci{ys{mm{ga{rt{8c{yh{me{wd {Bs{coul{x~

description:
Seated behind the counter  to take orders  this little  woman is not a
particularly  interesting sight.  She is the kind of  person that most
would talk to and forget about by the time they found something new to
occupy their curiosity.
10484.room_name: A front desk clerk waits here to file your order.
10484.name: A front desk clerk~

description: This mob holds the mprog which tranfsers players past the portcullis into the throne room.

10485.name: Portcullis Mprog Holder~

F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M speech 10453 yes~
M grall 10452 50~

description:
Elven features and a  down trodden expression mark  this poor enslaved
souls face.  Somehow it has managed to end up working in this facility
to produce torture machines.
10486.name: an {renslaved {8w{wo{Wrk{we{8r{x~

M speech 10469 polish~
M speech 10469 orb~

description:
A spider with  a round body and  very long legs which it  uses to move
about its  web at incredible  speeds.  This  orb weaver is much larger
than its mundane  cousins, easily large enough to make a meal of a man
foolish enough to get entangled in its web.
10490.room_name: A {wlong {rlegged {Co{rr{Mb {rwe{Wav{ger {8spider{x nimbly moves along its web.
10490.name: {*An {cov{mer{Wg{mro{cwn {Co{rr{Mb {rwe{Wav{ger{x~
10490.keywords: long legged overgrown orb weaver spider~

description:
Nearing three feet long and  ranging in color from stone gray to light
tan this large wasp can blend  seamlessly with  the rocks it inhabits.
Its long thin pinchers are capable of piercing even thick metal armor,
while its  eight inch long poison tipped stinger injects a  large dose
hematoxins which cause severe hemorrhaging in its victims.
10491.room_name: A {ws{8ton{we {rw{ga{ms{rp {yd{cr{wo{cn{ye{x protects the hive from intruders.
10491.name: a {ws{8ton{we {rw{ga{ms{rp {yd{cr{wo{cn{ye{x~

description:
Nearly twice the size of the drone males who protect her this gigantic
wasp is a particularly fierce opponent when confronted in her hive.  A
huge set  of long thin pinchers adorn her massive head.  The tusk like
structures are strong as steel and long enough to kill a swordsman and
still stay far out of reach of  his weapon.  However, the massive jaws
of this queen are a pleasantry compared to its poisonous sting.  While
the sting does not kill  its victim it paralyzes the victim and leaves
them in a conscious state of immobility.  She  then injects  eggs into
the victims body.  Once the larvae hatch they eat their way out of the
paralyzed being  ending in a horribly painful death that takes days to
reach its culmination.
10492.name: the {Bq{buee{Bn {ws{8ton{we {rw{ga{ms{rp{x~

description:
A middle aged halfling wrapped thickly with spider's webbing.  It will
live out the rest  of its days in horror  waiting for the  moment when
the spider will return to it to feed on its still living body.
10493.room_name: An {wensnared {rvictim{x hangs in the web waiting to be eaten.
10493.name: an {wensnared {rvictim{x~

description:
It towers high above this domed room, without remorse, for without
pity is he, the one called the Morning Star, is imprisoned here for
eternity.  He is a horned monstrosity, with three sets of wings
darkened in the blood of saints.  He stands half frozen in the lake,
wailing in chains as his pleas fall on deaf ears.  Will you be the one
to free him, by killing him and releasing his soul?
10494.name: {xThe {rF{Ra{8ll{Re{rn {yA{bn{Bg{be{yl{x~

description:
He bears the likeness of a humanoid, though unnaturally shapen with
bulging muscles and a disfigured face.  Perhaps he was an orc, or
titan, but his identity has long been abandoned.  He wears black
leather studded in iron studs that glow with intense heat from his
furnace.  The heat does not affect him, as he is the cursed Smith of
Hellforge.
